title: Spook sport
creator_credit: Norman McLaren, Mary-Ellen Bute, Creative Film Society and ONF | NFB
brief_description: An expressionistic interpretation of “Danse macabre” by Camille Saint-Saens. Conventional cel animation and pen drawings were done by Norman McLaren directly on 35 mm film stock.
